item.description: AWESOME event on Marathon weekend April 15-18 put on by Puma!  Come run a mile or two and help out a fun cause!  For every mile run on the Puma treadmill from April 15-18, Puma will donate one pair of shoes and $100 to Soles4Souls!  Stop by;)  Rock out.  Help out.  Feel wicked good.  See event flier here.
item.how_to_find_us: anyone can come, just come right in and run!
item.why: It's ridiculously fun and helps the world. Meet cool peeps.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Stop in to RUN for a WICKED GOOD cause April 15-18!
